name.ja: <ruby>Ｆａｉｒｙ<rt>フェアリー</rt></ruby> <ruby>Ｔａｌｅ<rt>テイル</rt></ruby> <ruby>序<rt>じょ</rt></ruby><ruby>章<rt>しょう</rt></ruby> <ruby>旅<rt>たび</rt></ruby><ruby>立<rt>だ</rt></ruby>ちの<ruby>暁<rt>ぎょう</rt></ruby><ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby>
name.ja_romaji: Fearī Teiru Joshō Tabidachi no Gyōkō

text.en: Any battle damage a player takes is halved. If you control a LIGHT Beast monster or a Level 7 or 8 Dragon Synchro Monster: You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Fairy Tale Prologue: Journey's Dawn" once per turn. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can send this card from the Field Zone to the GY; place 1 Field Spell from your hand or Deck face-up in your Field Zone, except "Fairy Tale Prologue: Journey's Dawn".
